Class ReplacementTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block.ReplacementTimer

  • public class ReplacementTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for all entities whose replacement is timed.
    Author:
    nitnelave

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplacementTimer

        public ReplacementTimer(java.util.Date time,
                boolean timed)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        time - The time at which the entity should be replaced.
        timed - Whether the replacement is in a world where replacements are timed, i.e. happen at a certain hour of the Minecraft day.

    • Method Detail

      • postPone

        public boolean postPone(int delay)
        Postpone the block's replacement.
        Parameters:
        delay - The amount of time to postpone by, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        True if the block was postponed.

      • getTime

        public java.util.Date getTime()
        Get the recorded time.
        Returns:
        The recorded time. Either the time the block was burnt or later if the replacement has been delayed.

      • checkReplace

        public boolean checkReplace()
        Check if the block should be repaired.
        Returns:
        False if it is not time to replace it yet.

      • isTimed

        public boolean isTimed()
        Get whether the replacement is in a world with timed repairs (repairs at a specific hour).
        Returns:
        True if the replacement is timed.
